attributes.action: Provide a bonus payment for Key Workers who haven’t stopped working.
attributes.additional_details:
Since the outbreak of Covid - 19 dedicated key workers have carried on working risking there own lives day in and day out keeping the nation going throughout this pandemic and haven’t received any form of payment or bonus from the government.
All the furlough workers have been helped including businesses and the self employed but nothing for the employed key workers.
Just something as a gesture of thanks would be most appreciated.
attributes.background: Provide a payment of some kind or tax relief bonus to all the key workers who have worked since the Covid-19 pandemic started who haven’t received any furlough or any other payments from the government.
